item.title: Bunga Mawar add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Saat kamu menginginkan sesuatu, seluruh alam semesta akan bersatu membantumu meraihnya." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Bunga Mawar add a quote by Paulo Coelho
item.description: "Lord, protect our decisions, because making Decision is a way of praying. Give us the courage after our doubts, to be able to choose between one road and another. May our YES always be a YES and our NO always be a NO. Once we have chosen our road, may we never look back nor allow our soul to be eaten away by remorse. And in order for this to be possible." -- Paulo Coelho

item.title: Bunga Mawar add a quote by Endah Sulwesi
item.description: "Cemplungkan saja bukunya, biar ramai..." -- Endah Sulwesi

item.title: Bunga Mawar add a quote by Antoine de Saint-Exupéry
item.description: "All grown-ups were once children... but only few of them remember it." -- Antoine de Saint-Exupéry

item.title: Bunga Mawar add a quote by Luis Sepúlveda
item.description: "Only those who dare may fly" -- Luis Sepúlveda

item.title: Bunga Mawar add a quote by Frank McCourt
item.description: "You might be poor, your shoes might be broken, but your mind is a palace." -- Frank McCourt

item.title: Bunga Mawar add a quote by Desmond Tutu
item.description: "Do your little bit of good where you are; it's those little bits of good put together that overwhelm the world." -- Desmond Tutu

item.title: Bunga Mawar add a quote by St. Augustine
item.description: "The world is a book and those who do not travel read only one page." -- St. Augustine

item.title: Bunga Mawar add a quote by Carl Sagan
item.description: "Every one of us is, in the cosmic perspective, precious. If a human disagrees with you, let him live. In a hundred billion galaxies, you will not find another." -- Carl Sagan

item.title: Bunga Mawar add a quote by Lemony Snicket
item.description: "Never trust anyone who has not brought a book with them." -- Lemony Snicket

item.title: Bunga Mawar add a quote by Michael Crichton
item.description: "Professor Johnston often said that if you didn't know history, you didn't know anything. You were a leaf that didn't know it was part of a tree." -- Michael Crichton
